content: In YAML format, create a directory of different dog breeds. For each breed, provide details such as size category (small, medium, large), lifespan, temperament, and distinctive characteristics.

Certainly! Below is a YAML-formatted directory of various dog breeds, including details on their size category, lifespan, temperament, and distinctive characteristics.

```yaml
dog_breeds:
  - name: Labrador Retriever
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 10-14 years
    temperament: Friendly, outgoing, intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Otter-like tail, webbed feet, dense water-repellent coat

  - name: German Shepherd
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 9-13 years
    temperament: Courageous, smart, protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Loyalty, intelligence, strong work ethic

  - name: Golden Retriever
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Kind, intelligent, patient
    distinctive_characteristics: Friendly disposition, dense water-repellent coat, intelligence

  - name: Bulldog
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Docile, courageous, stubborn
    distinctive_characteristics: Wrinkled face, distinctive pushed-in nose, muscular build

  - name: Poodle
    size_category: small to large (standard, miniature, toy)
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Intelligent, active, hypoallergenic
    distinctive_characteristics: Curly non-shedding coat, intelligence, various sizes

  - name: Beagle
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Affectionate, friendly, curious
    distinctive_characteristics: Strong sense of smell, triangular ears, compact build

  - name: Siberian Husky
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Outgoing, friendly, independent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, striking blue or multi-colored eyes, wolf-like appearance

  - name: Dachshund
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Lively, courageous, loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Long body and short legs, various coat types, hunting instincts

  - name: French Bulldog
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Affectionate, playful, adaptable
    distinctive_characteristics: Bat-like ears, compact build, friendly personality

  - name: Rottweiler
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Confident, calm, protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Strong build, black coat with rust markings, loyalty

  - name: Boxer
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Energetic, playful, loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Square muzzle, muscular build, energetic personality

  - name: Shih Tzu
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 10-18 years
    temperament: Affectionate, outgoing, alert
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, flowing coat, expressive eyes, happy demeanor

  - name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 9-14 years
    temperament: Affectionate, friendly, adaptable
    distinctive_characteristics: Silky coat, floppy ears, gentle disposition

  - name: Chihuahua
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-20 years
    temperament: Lively, loyal, protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Small size, large eyes, varied coat types

  - name: Doberman Pinscher
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 10-13 years
    temperament: Loyal, intelligent, courageous
    distinctive_characteristics: Sleek coat, muscular build, natural protective instincts

  - name: Bichon Frise
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Cheerful, friendly, hypoallergenic
    distinctive_characteristics: Powder-puff appearance, white double coat, playful nature

  - name: Great Dane
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 6-8 years
    temperament: Gentle, affectionate, playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Imposing size, floppy ears, friendly personality

  - name: Pug
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Cheerful, playful, stubborn
    distinctive_characteristics: Wrinkled face, curly tail, compact build

  - name: Australian Cattle Dog
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Energetic, intelligent, protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Herding instincts, blue or red coat with mottled or speckled pattern

  - name: Bernese Mountain Dog
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 6-8 years
    temperament:稳重,友好,忠诚
    distinctive_characteristics:三色毛发,强健的体格,适应寒冷气候的能力

  - name: Corgi (Welsh Cardigan and Pembroke)
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Energetic, intelligent, affectionate
    distinctive_characteristics: Short legs, long body, friendly personality

  - name: Maltese
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Playful, affectionate, hypoallergenic
    distinctive_characteristics: Pure white silky coat, compact size, gentle disposition

  - name: Samoyed
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Affectionate, friendly, intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick white double coat, smiling expression, sociable nature

  - name: Yorkshire Terrier
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Courageous, confident, playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, fine coat, small size, big personality

  - name: Irish Setter
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Energetic, friendly, outgoing
    distinctive_characteristics: Rich red coat, floppy ears, energetic personality

  - name: Miniature Schnauzer
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Intelligent, playful, loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Wirehaired coat, rectangular build, alert expression

  - name: Saint Bernard
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Gentle, patient, protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Massive size, fluffy coat, search and rescue history

  - name: Whippet
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Gentle, calm, affectionate
    distinctive_characteristics: Slender build, speed, smooth coat

  - name: Basset Hound
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Affectionate, calm, stubborn
    distinctive_characteristics: Short legs, long ears, excellent sense of smell

  - name: Afghan Hound
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Independent, dignified, aloof
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, flowing coat, regal appearance, agility

  - name: Pomeranian
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Intelligent, outgoing, playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Fox-like appearance, dense double coat, small size

  - name: Border Collie
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Intelligent, energetic, trainable
    distinctive_characteristics: Herding instincts, agility, intelligence

  - name: Bull Terrier
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Fearless, loyal, stubborn
    distinctive_characteristics: Unique egg-shaped head, muscular build, white or colored coat

  - name: Cocker Spaniel
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Affectionate, gentle, intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Floppy ears, wavy coat, hunting abilities

  - name: Dalmatian
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 11-13 years
    temperament: Energetic, loyal, outgoing
    distinctive_characteristics: Spotted coat, history as a coach dog, endurance

  - name: English Springer Spaniel
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Energetic, friendly, intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Floppy ears, dense coat, excellent hunting abilities

  - name: German Shorthaired Pointer
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Energetic, intelligent, versatile
    distinctive_characteristics: Short, dense coat, pointed ears, hunting abilities

  - name: Greyhound
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 10-13 years
    temperament: Gentle, calm, reserved
    distinctive_characteristics: Speed, slim build, short coat

  - name: Husky
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Outgoing, friendly, independent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, striking blue or multi-colored eyes, wolf-like appearance

  - name: Jack Russell Terrier
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 13-16 years
    temperament: Energetic, bold, intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Small size, sturdy build, high energy levels

  - name: Labrador Retriever
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Friendly, outgoing, intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Otter-like tail, webbed feet, dense water-repellent coat

  - name: Mastiff
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Calm, courageous, loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Massive size, strong build, protective instincts

  - name: Pug
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Cheerful, playful, stubborn
    distinctive_characteristics: Wrinkled face, curly tail, compact build

  - name: Rottweiler
    size_category: large
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Confident, calm, protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Strong build, black coat with rust markings, loyalty

  - name: Siberian Husky
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Outgoing, friendly, independent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, striking blue or multi-colored eyes, wolf-like appearance

  - name: Vizsla
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Energetic, affectionate, loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Rust-colored coat, slender build, strong hunting instincts

  - name: Weimaraner
    size_category: medium to large
    lifespan: 11-13 years
    temperament: Energetic, intelligent, affectionate
    distinctive_characteristics: Gray coat, expressive eyes, athletic build

  - name: West Highland White Terrier
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Bold, confident, playful
    distinctive_characteristics: White double coat, small size, sturdy build

  - name: Whippet
    size_category: medium
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Gentle, calm, affectionate
    distinctive_characteristics: Slender build, speed, smooth coat

  - name: Yorkshire Terrier
    size_category: small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Courageous, confident, playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, fine coat, small size, big personality
```

This list includes a variety of popular dog breeds, each with unique characteristics that make them special companions for different types of owners and lifestyles.
